metadata.name: Group Membership Reconnaissance Via Whoami.EXE
metadata.comment: Detects the execution of whoami.exe with the /group command line flag to show group membership for the current user, account type, security identifiers (SID), and attributes.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\whoami.exe')) AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('whoami.exe') AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' /groups')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -groups'))))

output.summary: Detects the execution of whoami.exe with the /group command line flag to show group membership for the current user, account type, security identifiers (SID), and attributes.
